title: Cato translated grammatically directing for vnderstanding, construing, parsing, making, and proouing the same Latine: and so for continuall practice of the grammaticall analysis and genesis. Done for the good of schooles, and of all desirous to recouer, or keep that which they got in the grammar-schoole, or to increase therein.
author: Brinsley, John, fl. 1581-1624.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by H. L[ownes] for Thomas Man,
